SELECT a.*,b.`cname`,c.`gwname`,b.`cid` ,c.`pId` AS postid FROM personnel a
INNER JOIN `uersandrole` up ON (up.`pId`=a.`pId`) INNER JOIN role b ON (b.`cid`=up.`cid`) INNER JOIN `post` c ON a.`ppost`=c.`pId`
a.`pId`!='admin' and a.pstatic=0
and a.pname like '%${pname}%'
ORDER BY a.`pentry` DESC
